author: clemlaflemme
content: I also have a question regarding `encode_node` in `ethereum.XXX.trie` : what's the purpose of this default call to parent implementation, up to frontier, while the implementation are actually the same ?

author: samwilsn
content: Because they might not be the same

author: samwilsn
content: Any time we do fork dependant stuff, we chain to the parent block.

author: clemlaflemme
content: and practically speaking, if I want to start at cancun, the only diff I've been able to find id `Transaction` becoming at some point `LegacyTransaction` otherwise is the same right?
